name: Search for endless adventures Demo v1
name_original: Search for endless adventures Demo v1
description:
A traveller arrives in the town where mayor imposter used people as a slaves. Many guardians were cursed and becomes zombies. 

Features of this demo:

-Character choice in begin.

-Town building.

-Ship sailing.

-Fake quests and dead ends as traps in town so you should search for real ones.

-Secret doors and rewards.

-Some insane NPC.

-Little anti-aging institute.

-Fight with a rock band and many more.

This is work in progress and will be many more features.
